import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import productSlice from"./features/productSlice";import userSlice from"./features/userSlice";import appApi from"./services/appApi";//persit our store
import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import{thunk}from"redux-thunk";//reducers
const reducer=combineReducers({user:userSlice,products:productSlice,[appApi.reducerPath]:appApi.reducer});const persistConfig={key:"root",storage,blackList:[appApi.reducerPath,"products"]};// persist our store
const persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,reducer);// creating the store
const store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer,middleware:()=>[thunk,appApi.middleware]});export default store;
